###Q1
$$\frac{\pi^2}{6}$$

`r (pi^2)/6`

```{r}
nIters = 500
sum = 0
for(i in 1:nIters){
  sum = sum + 1/i^2
}
sum
```

###Q4
```{r}
f_fn = function(x){
  return (x^4 + 3*x^3 - 2*x^2 - 1)
}
fprime_fn = function(x){
  return (4*x^3 + 9*x^2 - 4*x)
}

x = numeric(1)
i = 1
x[i] = 1
tolerance <- 0.00001
while( abs( f_fn(x[i])) > tolerance) {
  i = i + 1
  x[i] = x[i-1] - f_fn(x[i-1]) / fprime_fn(x[i-1]) 
  print(x[i])
}
print(x)
```
